duties_responsibilities.duty: Works closely with the Executive Administrative Assistants in the office.
Interfaces with the broker-dealer or custodian to open new accounts, update account information, fill out necessary forms and perform routine client supporting tasks.

Specific client service responsibilities may include:Filling out necessary forms for opening or maintaining accountsInterfacing with the broker-dealer or custodian to obtain information, account data and convey service requests.Maintain information in the CRM system.Handling requests for transfers of funds in and out of accounts.Entering or updating cost basis information.Other responsibilities as assigned by the Financial Advisors and/or Executive Assistants in the office.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or associate degree required
